author: Austin Songer
description: Identifies when an ElastiCache security group has been created.
false_positives: A ElastiCache security group may be created by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Security group creations by unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS ElastiCache Security Group Created
query:
event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:elasticache.amazonaws.com and event.action:"Create Cache Security Group" and
event.outcome:success
setup: The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
